text: ippeal allahu ninnalkk bharam kuracc tannirikkunnu. ninnalil balahinatayuntenn avan ariyukayum ceytirikkunnu. atinal ninnalute kuttattil ksamasilaraya nuruperuntayirunnal avarkk irunur pere jayiccatakkavunnatanâ€Œ. ninnalute kuttattil ayiram peruntayirunnal allahuvinre anumati prakaram rantayiram pere avarkku jayiccatakkavunnatanâ€Œ. allahu ksamasilareateappamakunnu
